title: Stable ICE with fieldless enums and dyn traits

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![allow(dead_code)] pub fn main() { // Instantiating Foo with a concrete type will not fail let _ = Foo::::new(); } pub struct Foo { base: FooBase, value: T, } impl Foo { pub fn new() -> Box> { todo!() } } pub trait FooTrait {} pub struct FooBase { cls: Bar, } // Bar *must* be a fieldless enum pub enum Bar {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0 (2fd73fabe 2021-03-23) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0 commit-date: 2021-03-23 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.51.0 LLVM version: 11.0.1 (also crashes on beta and nightly) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: layout.abi.is_uninhabited()', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:228:21 ```
Backtrace

``` 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0/library/core/src/panicking.rs:92:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0/library/core/src/panicking.rs:50:5 3: rustc_middle::ty::layout::layout_raw 4: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::layout_raw>::compute 5: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 6: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 7: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 9: as rustc_target::abi::LayoutOf>::layout_of 10: ::spanned_layout_of 11: rustc_middle::ty::layout:: for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::pointee_info_at 12: rustc_middle::ty::layout:: for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::pointee_info_at 13: as rustc_middle::ty::layout::FnAbiExt>::new_internal::{{closure}}::{{closure}} 14: rustc_target::abi::call::ArgAbi::new 15: core::ops::function::impls:: for &mut F>::call_mut 16: as core::iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::fold 17: as alloc::vec::spec_from_iter::SpecFromIter>::from_iter 18: as rustc_middle::ty::layout::FnAbiExt>::new_internal 19: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::::predefine_fn 20: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 21: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 22: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 23: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 24: ::codegen_crate 25: rustc_session::utils::::time 26: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 27: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 28: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 29: rustc_span::with_source_map 30: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 31: rustc_span::with_session_globals ```
